hero.title: Hi, I'm Ronald Zamora
hero.subtitle: Senior Full-Stack Developer
hero.description: I build scalable digital products that empower businesses and users.

experience.title: Experience
experience.p1: Results-driven Full-Stack Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience delivering robust, scalable web applications from concept to production.
experience.p2: I've led projects supporting thousands of users, integrating real-time features and achieving top-tier performance and reliability.
experience.p3: I thrive in dynamic, collaborative teams where I can drive innovation, mentor others, and deliver solutions that make a measurable impact.

projects.title: Projects
projects.explore: Explore a selection of projects where I've delivered real business value through technology, innovation, and measurable results.
projects.foodllowers: Projects prefixed with F are part of the Foodllowers application suite—a business ecosystem I designed and built from scratch, divided into specialized apps for clarity.

stack.title: Stack
stack.description: My stack is focused on modern, high-impact technologies that enable scalable, maintainable, and high-performance solutions. I leverage leading frameworks, cloud platforms, and developer tools to deliver business value and stay at the forefront of the industry.

education.title: Education
education.description1: I'm a self-taught developer committed to continuous learning, always seeking out the latest trends and best practices from industry leaders.
education.description2: I turn knowledge into results by applying what I learn directly in real-world projects.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: Full-Stack Engineer passionate about solving complex challenges and delivering real business impact.
about.p2: I excel in cross-functional teams, combining technical expertise, creativity, and clear communication to build scalable, user-centric products.
about.p3: Inspired by gaming, I bring a unique focus on user experience and creative problem-solving.
about.p4: Let's connect and create meaningful solutions together.

footer.built: Built with ❤️ using Astro, React, and Tailwind CSS
footer.name: Ronald Zamora

streamingx.title: StreamingX
streamingx.description: Engineered a scalable video platform inspired by YouTube, enabling seamless streaming and rapid content delivery. Integrated advanced video processing (FFmpeg) and cloud-native architecture to support high user concurrency.
keyPoints: Led end-to-end development with Next.js and TypeScript
Implemented advanced video processing pipeline using FFmpeg and Cloudflare R2
Optimized for high concurrency and rapid video load times

foodllowers.title: Foodllowers
foodllowers.description: Developed a high-availability e-commerce platform serving 10,000+ concurrent users with real-time synchronization and seamless payment processing. Designed for reliability and business growth.
keyPoints: Handled 10k+ concurrent users with 0 downtime
Integrated MercadoPago for 99.9% payment success rate
Achieved real-time updates with <200ms latency

f-kitchens.title: F-Kitchens
f-kitchens.description: Built a real-time kitchen management system with enterprise-grade security, streamlining order processing and minimizing errors for food businesses.
keyPoints: Processed 500+ daily orders in real-time
Reduced order errors by 78% with robust validation systems
Maintained 99.95% system uptime SLA

f-deliverys.title: F-Deliverys
f-deliverys.description: Created a logistics optimization engine with automated CI/CD and real-time monitoring, accelerating deliveries and deployment cycles for business operations.
keyPoints: Optimized delivery routes for 30% faster deliveries
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 40%
Enabled real-time tracking with 98.7% accuracy

f-influencers.title: F-Influencers
f-influencers.description: Developed an influencer analytics platform with real-time dashboards and Agile workflows, empowering marketing teams with actionable insights and scalable data pipelines.
keyPoints: Delivered real-time sales analytics with <500ms data latency
Accelerated dashboard loads by 40% via edge caching
Reduced payout processing errors by 78% through validation systems
Scaled data pipelines to handle 1.2M+ monthly events

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Modern, high-performance portfolio built with Astro, React, and TypeScript. Optimized for UX, accessibility, and SEO to highlight engineering skills and personal brand.
keyPoints: Extreme optimization for speed and user experience
Advanced UI animations and custom color palette
100/100 Lighthouse score and SEO best practices
Responsive, accessible, and multi-language (EN/ES)
